cards.name: Hypernova Finale
cards.rulesText: Kirby inhales the battlefield, dealing massive damage in a straight line and teleporting to any adjacent space afterward.

cards.name: Copy Essence
cards.rulesText: Gain one discarded Combat card from a chosen foe and use its stats this turn.

cards.name: Morph Hammer Spin
cards.rulesText: Transform into Hammer form, add +2 Attack, then move 2 squares.

cards.name: Star Dash
cards.rulesText: Dash up to 4 squares, ignoring engagement and terrain.

cards.name: Eat and Adapt
cards.rulesText: Devour an adjacent enemy to cancel their action and copy one of their traits for the rest of the game.

cards.name: Copy Move
cards.rulesText: Draw two cards; if either is a Special, play it immediately without cost.

cards.name: Stomach Storage
cards.rulesText: Keep a swallowed card face-down; discard it later to heal 3 HP.

cards.name: Friendship Finale
cards.rulesText: Summon three Star Allies to split incoming damage with Kirby this round.

cards.name: Victory Pose
cards.rulesText: Taunt all foes in line of sight; they suffer âˆ’1 Defense on their next attack while Kirby shifts 1 square.

cards.name: Superstar Style
cards.rulesText: Leap 2 squares and gain flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Ultimate Copy
cards.rulesText: Copy every face-up trait of one target for one full round.

cards.name: Power of Heart
cards.rulesText: For each adjacent ally, Kirby's next attack gains +2 Attack and pushes the target 2 squares.

cards.name: Star Warrior Blitz
cards.rulesText: Strike two different enemies for 2 damage each, moving 1 square after every hit.

cards.name: Final Star Cannon
cards.rulesText: Discard any number of Combat cards; deal ranged damage equal to double their combined Attack values to one target.
